CustomField.description: Is the "Exclude from Emails" box checked on the Grantee's account record? If checked will suppress report reminders from being sent to the grantee.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is the "Exclude from Emails" box checked on the Grantee's account record? If checked will suppress report reminders from being sent to the grantee.
CustomField.label: Exclude from Email
